frameDefinitions: Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) have an agreement.
A Cognizer makes a Decision, which may be about an entity or a course of action.
In this frame a Theme is moved by a Vehicle which is not directly under their power.
Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) negotiate an agreement.
This is an abstract frame for acts performed by sentient beings.
Words in the frame refer to any Document that has a legal status or conventional social significance.
frameExamples: The US and Russia have an <t>agreement</t> to share early warning data on missile launches.
So far , we have <t>agreed</t>to cede 100km of coastline to Kiribati . DNI
They got their marriage <t>licence</t> from Canada.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e. agentive) party of the agreement, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is, <fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.
The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or group of participants) in the agreement. It is generally encoded within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by with).
An expression of the commitment of the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered by the agreement.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in having an agreement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the agreement was made.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an agreement was made.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides on a course of action.
<fen>Decision</fen> identifies the entity or course of action upon which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides.
The time or time period over which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
The place where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity which moves by means of the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance of the <fen>Theme</fen>. It is usually expressed in a <ment>PP</ment>-complement or the direct object.
Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>.
The <fen>Path</fen> describes the trajectory of the motion.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is the endpoint of the trajectory of motion.
The Area is the location where the motion takes place.
When the riding takes place.

The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e.
agentive) party of the agreement, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is,
<fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and
peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself
generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.

The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or
group of participants) in the agreement. It is generally encoded
within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by with).
An expression of the commitment made by the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in making an agreement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Act</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> performs intentionally.
The <fen>Agent</fen> performs the intentional act.
This role identifies the time when the Agent acts intentionally.
This role identifies the place where the intentional act occurs.
The holder of the document.
The authority that issues the document.
Obligation is the obligation that is imposed on the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>.
Right is the right of the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>  that is authorized by the <fen>Document</fen>.
Status is the state of the Bearer of the Document indicated by the Document.
Document is the piece of paper that has the legal status.
listRoleExamples: <fex>AOL 's</fex> agreement with the ACLU will soon expire , and renogotiation is not a real possibility .
Mozilla Foundation now has a bindingagreement <fex>with America Online</fex>.
The US and Russia have an agreement <fex>to share early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
Some types of alloy steel have been covered in the expiring <fex>trade</fex> agreement.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have an agreement to cooperate in destroying surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.
The missile agreement <fex>of 1952</fex> was still in force, however.
The <fex>Kyoto</fex> treaty has so far been relatively ineffectual.
<fex>Mo</fex> decided to quit the program.
Mo decided <fex>to quit the program</fex>.
The State Cabinet <fex>today</fex> decided to file an appeal in the Supreme Court seeking an extension of six months for implementation of its judgment
<fex>At the first</fex> crossroad we decided to wait.
<fex>Margeret</fex> flew to Cabo San Lucas.
Professor Frink sailed to Italy <fex>on an oceanliner</fex>.
We flew <fex>from Atlanta</fex>.
The caravan rode <fex>through the desert</fex>.
We sailed <fex>to Morocco</fex>.
We rode <fex>around the state</fex>.
We will fly back to New York <fex>in September</fex>.
On Monday, <fex>the airline</fex> reached a deal with the Canadian Auto Workers.
Mozilla Foundation has finally reached an agreement <fex>with America Online</fex>.
The US and Russia have agreed <fex>to share early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
Some types of alloy steel have been covered in the expiring <fex>trade</fex> agreement.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have agreed to cooperate in destroying surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.

The town coucil members reached an agreement <fex>at the City Hall plenary session</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> have not yet acted .
<fex>My </fex> visa will expire next month.
<fex>US consulate</fex> issued a Visa to Ms. Yang to travel to San Francisco.
They were all under subpoena <fex>to appear in court.</fex>
Raymond has a <fex>fishing</fex> licence.
The couple just got their <fex>marriage</fex> certificate.
The police need a search <fex><t>warrant</t></fex> to enter his house.
